actions.text: Read second time and referred jointly to Senate Committees on Budget; Governmental Affairs by unanimous consent pursuant to the order of August 4, 1977.
Committee on Governmental Affairs requested executive comment from General Services Administration; CBO; OMB; Treasury Department.

official_title: A bill to amend the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 to require a two-thirds vote in the Senate and House of Representatives for any modification of the Second Concurrent Budget Resolution.

summary.text: Amends the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 to require an affirmative recorded vote of two-thirds of all Members of each House of the Congress for any revision of the Second Concurrent Budget Resolution.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 to require a two-thirds vote in the Senate and House of Representatives for any modification of the Second Concurrent Budget Resolution.
